ARABIC: إِنَّا نَحْنُ نُحْىِۦ وَنُمِيتُ وَإِلَيْنَا ٱلْمَصِيرُ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: It is We who give life and cause to die and We are their final destination.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: We are the one who give life and death, and to Us will be the destination.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Surely it is We Who give life and cause death, and to Us shall all return
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: We give life and cause things to die. To Us all things will return.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Indeed it is We Who give life, and give death, and towards Us only is the return.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Verily, it is We Who give life and cause death; and to Us is the final return.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Surely We give life and cause to die, and to Us is the eventual coming;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: It is We who give life, and make to die, and to Us is the homecoming.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Lo! We it is Who quicken and give death, and unto Us is the journeying.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Truly, it is We who give life and cause death, and to Us shall all return
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Verily We! it is We Who give life and cause death, and Unto Us is the journeying.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Indeed it is We who give life and bring death, and toward Us is the [final] destination.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Verily it is We Who give Life and Death; and to Us is the Final Goal-
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Verily, We it is Who give life and cause death; and to Us is the final return,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: It is We who give life and make to die. To Us is the arrival.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: It is We who control life and death, and to Us is the destination.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Indeed, it is We who give life and cause death, and to Us is the destination
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [50:43] Indeed it is We Who give life and bring death, and to Us is the journey’s end.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Lo! We it is Who quicken) for the resurrection (and give death) in the life of the world, (and unto Us is the journeying) after death.
